Design: ManyTwitch

    28 Jun 2017

ManyTwitch is a multiple Twitch stream viewer I developed using AngularJS and CSS variables. This web app allows users view up to six Twitch livestreams at once in two layouts depending on if they want to focus on just the livestreams with one specific stream’s chat or watch all the...
